title: German red cabbage with apples
ingredients: ['40g unsalted butter', '1 tablespoon sugar', '1 medium onion, finely chopped', '1kg red cabbage, washed, core removed and finely shredded', '2 apples, peeled, core removed and diced', '4 tablespoons apple cider vinegar or red wine vinegar', 'salt, to taste', '125ml beef stock or red wine', 'freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '2 tablespoons lingonberry preserves (optional)']
